title: Replace product image with cricket bat and update price to 999

requirements.summary: Replace the product card image at grid position 3 with a generated cricket bat image asset
acceptanceCriteria: The product card at position 3 displays a cricket bat image instead of the previous image.
The image renders correctly in the ProductCard component without broken src links.
The cricket bat image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/cricket-bat.dim_400x400.png.

file_operations.description: Update the third product object in the hardcoded products array to reference the generated cricket bat image at frontend/public/assets/generated/cricket-bat.dim_400x400.png. Change the image property from its current value to '/assets/generated/cricket-bat.dim_400x400.png'. Ensure the product name and category are updated appropriately to reflect that this is now a cricket bat product.

requirements.summary: Update the price displayed in the product card at grid position 4 to 999
acceptanceCriteria: The price shown on the targeted product card reads 999 (or ₹999 / $999 consistent with existing formatting).
No other product card prices are modified.
The change is reflected in the hardcoded product data within ProductShowcase.tsx.

file_operations.description: Update the fourth product object in the hardcoded products array to set the price property to 999. Maintain the existing price formatting pattern used in the component (e.g., if prices are displayed with a currency symbol like ₹ or $, ensure consistency).
